data.title: nanoq
data.description: Minimal but speedy quality control for nanopore reads in Rust :bear:
data.name: nanoq

evidence: README install command: "conda install -c conda-forge -c bioconda nanoq"
Owner metadata: owner_type is 'User' and README uses first person singular ('my bad'), indicating a personal project rather than an institution or community-governed project.

Purpose: '`Nanoq` implements ultra-fast read filters and summary reports for high-throughput nanopore reads.' and usage examples show it as a CLI tool users run directly (`nanoq -i test.fq.gz -o reads.fq`).
